title: Joel Anderson on L.A. Riots and 'that' Texas story
description:
Bomani Jones welcomes Joel Anderson of Slate to talk about the “incident” with Texas special teams coach Jeff Banks and his partner’s pet monkey supposedly attacking a child on Halloween (2:21). Plus, they dive into Joel's newest project, “Slow Burn” Season 6 on the L.A. Riots (10:27). Episode one is available now!
